FHE use cases

A curated list of use cases and applications of Fully Homomorphic Encryption.

Use cases and applications

  • Spiral for BTC - Look up any BTC address balance, without revealing the address to anyone - 09.2022
  • Ensuring security of artificial pancreas device system using homomorphic encryption - 08.2022
  • Encrypted Conway’s Game of Life in Rust with the Concrete library - 18.08.2022
  • Secure human action recognition by encrypted neural network inference - 15.08.2022
  • Morfix.io — BWeb-based UI to play around with the Microsoft Seal library - 22.07.2022
  • Titanic ML from disaster — Building a predictive model over encrypted data with Concrete-ML - 07.07.2022
  • lattigo-polls — Web-application for scheduling meetings using lattigo - 07.06.2022
  • Spiral wiki — Read Wikipedia privately using homomorphic encryption - 24.05.2022
  • crypto-geofence - Geo-fencing demo application based on Paillier scheme - 10.04.2019
  • nGraph-HE - Deep Learning (DL) with HE through Intel’s DL graph compiler nGraph based on SEAL - 08.07.2021
  • Rosetta - A privacy-preserving framework based on TensorFlow - 26.04.2022
  • tf-encrypted - Bridge between TensorFlow and the Microsoft SEAL library - 10.03.2022

Join the discussion on Discord

  • FHE.org discord server



Contributions to this from the community are welcome! Read the contribution guidelines first.
